    • Method Detail

      • setToRemoveBorderLines

        public void setToRemoveBorderLines(int lastColumn,
                                   int lastRow)
        if this is set, vertical lines found at polar radius 0 and width from origin are removed and so are horizontal lines found at polar radius and height from origin.

      • overrideMinimumLineLength

        Parameters:
        length -

      • overrideThreshold

        public void overrideThreshold(float threshold)
        override the default threshold of 1.e7. the absolute average differernce of chords over a window size must be less than the threshold in order for the segment to be considered a line. Increasing this number too much will possibly result in including curves.
        Parameters:
        threshold -
